description: Describes one or more flow logs.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Describing flow logs can help attackers understand which users are accessing specific network resources.
Flow logs can reveal network configurations, allowing attackers to map out the network layout
By analyzing flow logs, attackers can infer traffic patterns and potentially sensitive information about network communications
Attackers can use the flow logs to automate the collection of network traffic data for further analysis

incidents.description: Compromised Cloud Compute Credentials: Case Studies From the Wild

securityImplications: Attackers might use DescribeFlowLogs to review VPC flow log configurations, aiming to understand what network traffic is being logged.
